original: @133b # // rgya gar skad du /üîΩsv'abn'a au h'a na /
analyzed: @133b # // rgya gar skad du / sv'abn'a au h'a na /
translated: In Sanskrit:üîΩSvapna-uddhara

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rmi lam brtag pa /
analyzed: rmi lam brtag pa /
translated: Dream Examination

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha.

original: rmi lam sna tshogs las byung ba //
analyzed: rmi lam sna tshogs las byung ba //
translated: From the various dreams that arise,

original: de yi brtag pa bshad par bya //
analyzed: de yi brtag pa bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain their examination.

original: dang po'i thun la rmi lam byung //
analyzed: dang po'i thun la rmi lam byung //
translated: If a dream occurs in the first watch,

original: lo gcig nang du 'bras bu 'byin //
analyzed: lo gcig nang du 'bras bu 'byin //
translated: It will bear fruit within a year.

original: thun gnyis zla ba brgyad bar la //
analyzed: thun gnyis zla ba brgyad bar la //
translated: In the second watch, up to eight months,

original: thun gsum zla ba gsum gyi bar //
analyzed: thun gsum zla ba gsum gyi bar //
translated: In the third watch, up to three months,

original: thun bzhi zla ba phyed bar du //
analyzed: thun bzhi zla ba phyed bar du //
translated: In the fourth watch, up to half a month,

original: mthong bar 'gyur ba the tshom med //
analyzed: mthong bar 'gyur ba the tshom med //
translated: It will be seen, there is no doubt.

original: skya rengs shar ba'i dus nyid la //
analyzed: skya rengs shar ba'i dus nyid la //
translated: At the time of sunrise,

original: zhag bcu'i nang du 'bras bu 'byin //
analyzed: zhag bcu'i nang du 'bras bu 'byin //
translated: It will bear fruit within ten days.

original: de rjes rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de rjes rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: After that, I will fully explainüîΩThe virtuous and non-virtuous actions.

original: nyon cig dge dang mi dge'i las /
analyzed: nyon cig dge dang mi dge'i las /
translated: Listen!

original: bzhon pa ba lang dang ni glang chen zhon pa dang // khang pa zangs ri rtse dang ni nags kyi ljon shing dang // gru nang 'dug ste pi wang 'dzin par byed pa dang // kha zas za zhing du byed rtag par dngos po 'thob //
analyzed: bzhon pa ba lang dang ni glang chen zhon pa dang // khang pa zangs ri rtse dang ni nags kyi ljon shing dang // gru nang 'dug ste pi wang 'dzin par byed pa dang // kha zas za zhing du byed rtag par dngos po 'thob //
translated: Riding on an ox, an elephant, a horse, a donkey, a camel, a buffalo, a sheep, a goat, a deer, a peacock, a swan, a crane, a vulture, a crow, a hawk, a garu·∏ça, a bee, a fly, a mosquito, a snake, a lizard, a cat, a dog, a jackal, a lion, a tiger, a bear, a hyena, a monkey, a human, a man, a woman, a boy, or a girl;

original: mtshon chas rdeg dang srog chags phra mos lus khebs dang // de bzhin lus kyi ljan ljin rnam par dag pa dang // bshang ba'i rjes su 'jug dang lus las khrag 'dzag dang // rmi lam rnams na bgrod min la zhugs shis pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon chas rdeg dang srog chags phra mos lus khebs dang // de bzhin lus kyi ljan ljin rnam par dag pa dang // bshang ba'i rjes su 'jug dang lus las khrag 'dzag dang // rmi lam rnams na bgrod min la zhugs shis pa'o //
translated: being struck by weapons, being covered with small animals, likewise being purified of bodily impurities, following after feces, blood flowing from the body, and in dreams engaging in intercourse with those one should not.

original: rgyal po glang chen rta mchog dang // 'gron bu glang dang ba rnams dang // gang gis gnyid kyi mtha' mar @134a * //
analyzed: rgyal po glang chen rta mchog dang // 'gron bu glang dang ba rnams dang // gang gis gnyid kyi mtha' mar @134a * //
translated: A king, an elephant, an excellent horse, a cow, an ox, a buffalo, a sheep, a goat, a deer, a peacock, a swan, a crane, a vulture, a crow, a hawk, a garu·∏ça, a bee, a fly, a mosquito, a snake, a lizard, a cat, a dog, a jackal, a lion, a tiger, a bear, a hyena, a monkey, a human, a man, a woman, a boy, or a girl;üîΩif one sees these at the end of sleep,

original: mthong ; / de yi nye du mang por 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong ; / de yi nye du mang por 'gyur //
translated: one will have many relatives.

original: shing ljon 'o ma 'bras bu can //
analyzed: shing ljon 'o ma 'bras bu can //
translated: A tree, a milk-producing fruit tree,

original: gang gis gcig pu de la 'dzegs //
analyzed: gang gis gcig pu de la 'dzegs //
translated: if one alone climbs it,

original: de la 'dug nas gnyid sad na //
analyzed: de la 'dug nas gnyid sad na //
translated: and sits there, and wakes up,

original: myur du nor ni 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du nor ni 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: He will quickly obtain wealth.

original: gang gis khang pa zangs 'dug nas zos //
analyzed: gang gis khang pa zangs 'dug nas zos //
translated: If he eats in a copper house,

original: de bzhin rgya mtsho brgal ba'i mi ;
analyzed: de bzhin rgya mtsho brgal ba'i mi ;
translated: and likewise if he crosses the ocean,

original: / dman pa'i rigs su skyes kyang ni //
analyzed: / dman pa'i rigs su skyes kyang ni //
translated: even if he is born in a low caste,

original: de ni rgyal por 'gyur bar 'ong //
analyzed: de ni rgyal por 'gyur bar 'ong //
translated: he will become a king.üîΩIf he eats yogurt and rice

original: gang zhig rdzing bu'i dkyil du ni //
analyzed: gang zhig rdzing bu'i dkyil du ni //
translated: in the middle of a pond,

original: padma'i 'dab ma chen po'i nang //üîΩzho dang 'o thug za byed pa //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma chen po'i nang // zho dang 'o thug za byed pa //
translated: inside a large lotus leaf,

original: sa bdag 'thob par the tshom med //
analyzed: sa bdag 'thob par the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt he will obtain dominion over the land.üîΩIf he sees at the end of sleep

original: mar me rgyal mtshan shing rta gdugs //
analyzed: mar me rgyal mtshan shing rta gdugs //
translated: a lamp, a victory banner, a chariot, a parasol,

original: bu mo shing lo 'bras bu zan //üîΩgnyid kyi mtha' mar gang gis mthong //
analyzed: bu mo shing lo 'bras bu zan // gnyid kyi mtha' mar gang gis mthong //
translated: a girl, a tree, a fruit, or food,

original: bla na med pa'i dpal thob 'gyur //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dpal thob 'gyur //
translated: he will obtain unsurpassed glory.

original: mi dag gi ni sha rnams ni //
analyzed: mi dag gi ni sha rnams ni //
translated: If he eats human flesh,

original: btsos sam ma btsos gang yang rung //
analyzed: btsos sam ma btsos gang yang rung //
translated: whether cooked or uncooked,

original: rmi lam du ni gang gis zos //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni gang gis zos //
translated: whatever he sees in a dream,

original: nyon cig de yi yon tan gang //üîΩrkang pa zos na lnga brgya ste //
analyzed: nyon cig de yi yon tan gang // rkang pa zos na lnga brgya ste //
translated: listen to what his qualities will be.üîΩIf he eats the feet, he will have five hundred;

original: lag pa zos na stong phrag gcig / stong phrag brgya'am rgyal srid ni //
analyzed: lag pa zos na stong phrag gcig / stong phrag brgya'am rgyal srid ni //
translated: if he eats the hands, one thousand;

original: mgo bo zos na thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mgo bo zos na thob par 'gyur //
translated: If he eats the head, he will obtain it.

original: gang gi rgyu mas grong dang ni //
analyzed: gang gi rgyu mas grong dang ni //
translated: If he wraps a town

original: yang na grong khyer dkris pa ni //
analyzed: yang na grong khyer dkris pa ni //
translated: or a city with his entrails,

original: grong gcig dkris na rgyal phran thob //
analyzed: grong gcig dkris na rgyal phran thob //
translated: if he wraps one town, he will obtain a kingdom;

original: grong khyer dkris na rgyal po thob //üîΩlham gnyis dang ni gdugs dang ni //
analyzed: grong khyer dkris na rgyal po thob // lham gnyis dang ni gdugs dang ni //
translated: if he wraps a city, he will obtain a king.üîΩHaving obtained two shoes, an umbrella,üîΩand a sharp, stainless sword,

original: ral gri rnon po dri med dag / thob nas gang zhig gnyid sad na //
analyzed: ral gri rnon po dri med dag / thob nas gang zhig gnyid sad na //
translated: he who awakens from sleep

original: de ni lam du bgrod par bshad //
analyzed: de ni lam du bgrod par bshad //
translated: is said to travel on the path.

original: gang zhig gru la zhon nas ni //
analyzed: gang zhig gru la zhon nas ni //
translated: If one boards a boat

original: zhig pa yin yang yang dag sgrol //
analyzed: zhig pa yin yang yang dag sgrol //
translated: and is rescued even though it breaks apart,

original: de yi lam bgrod shes par bya //
analyzed: de yi lam bgrod shes par bya //
translated: one should know that one has traveled on that path.

original: de yang myur du ldog par nges //
analyzed: de yang myur du ldog par nges //
translated: One should be certain that one will quickly return.üîΩIf in a dream one sees the earth

original: gang gi sa rnams rnam par 'chag / rab tu g-yo ba'i rmi lam ni //
analyzed: gang gi sa rnams rnam par 'chag / rab tu g-yo ba'i rmi lam ni //
translated: trembling and breaking apart,

original: de yi nor ni brlag par 'ong //
analyzed: de yi nor ni brlag par 'ong //
translated: one's wealth will be destroyed.

original: yang na lus la na tsha 'byung //
analyzed: yang na lus la na tsha 'byung //
translated: Or, one will have an illness in the body.

original: gang la rnam par gnod byed pa'i //üîΩrva can rnams dang mche ba can //
analyzed: gang la rnam par gnod byed pa'i // rva can rnams dang mche ba can //
translated: If one sees those who harm himüîΩwith horns or tusks,

original: spre'u 'am yang na phag pa byung //
analyzed: spre'u 'am yang na phag pa byung //
translated: monkeys or pigs,

original: de la rje bo'i 'jigs pa 'byung //
analyzed: de la rje bo'i 'jigs pa 'byung //
translated: he will have fear of his lord.

original: gang la til mar mngon par byug /
analyzed: gang la til mar mngon par byug /
translated: Whoever anoints with sesame oil,

original: 'o ma'am yang rna mar gyis bskus //
analyzed: 'o ma'am yang rna mar gyis bskus //
translated: or is anointed with milk or ghee,

original: de dang 'dra ba gang yang rung //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba gang yang rung //
translated: or anything similar to that,

original: de ni nad du rnam par bshad //üîΩshing rta bong bu rnga mor ldan //
analyzed: de ni nad du rnam par bshad // shing rta bong bu rnga mor ldan //
translated: that is explained as a disease.üîΩWhoever mounts a chariot, donkey, or camel,

original: gang zhig gcig pus de la 'dzegs //
analyzed: gang zhig gcig pus de la 'dzegs //
translated: and ascends it alone,

original: de stengs 'dug nas gnyid sad na //
analyzed: de stengs 'dug nas gnyid sad na //
translated: and while lying on top falls asleep,

original: myur du 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: will quickly attain death.üîΩIf in a dream one embraces a woman

original: bud med gos dmar 'dzin pa @134b dang // phreng ba byug pa dmar po can //üîΩgang la 'khyud byed rmi lam byung //
analyzed: bud med gos dmar 'dzin pa @134b dang // phreng ba byug pa dmar po can // gang la 'khyud byed rmi lam byung //
translated: holding red garments, a red garland or ointment,

original: de yis mtshan mo phyi ma med //üîΩbud med gos dkar gon pa dang // rjes su byug phreng dkar por ldan //
analyzed: de yis mtshan mo phyi ma med // bud med gos dkar gon pa dang // rjes su byug phreng dkar por ldan //
translated: that person will have no more nights.üîΩIf in a dream one embraces a woman

original: rmi lam du ni gang la 'khyud //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni gang la 'khyud //
translated: wearing white garments, with a white garland or ointment,

original: de yis dpal ni thams cad 'byung //üîΩnag po'i gos can bud med ni //üîΩphreng ba byug pa nag por ldan //
analyzed: de yis dpal ni thams cad 'byung // nag po'i gos can bud med ni // phreng ba byug pa nag por ldan //
translated: that person will obtain all glory.üîΩIf in a dream one embraces a woman

original: gang la 'khyud byed rmi lam byung //
analyzed: gang la 'khyud byed rmi lam byung //
translated: wearing black garments, with a black garland or ointment,

original: de yis dpal ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis dpal ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
translated: that person's glory will increase.üîΩIf in a dream one embraces a woman

original: ser po'i gos can bud med gang //
analyzed: ser po'i gos can bud med gang //
translated: wearing yellow garments, with a yellow garland or ointment,üîΩthat person will obtain all glory.

original: ser po'i phreng dang byug pa can //
analyzed: ser po'i phreng dang byug pa can //
translated: One who is embraced by a woman with yellow garlands and ointments

original: rmi lam du ni gang la 'khyud //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni gang la 'khyud //
translated: in a dream

original: de yis rgyal srid thob par 'gyur //üîΩnyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rmi lam du //
analyzed: de yis rgyal srid thob par 'gyur // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rmi lam du //
translated: will obtain a kingdom.üîΩOne who sees in a dream

original: yang na zla ba gang gis mthong //
analyzed: yang na zla ba gang gis mthong //
translated: either the orb of the sun or the moon

original: nad can nad las grol ba dang // nad med yin na dpal ldan 'gyur //
analyzed: nad can nad las grol ba dang // nad med yin na dpal ldan 'gyur //
translated: will be freed from illness if sick, and if healthy, will become glorious.

original: gang zhig dkar po'i sprul gyis ni //
analyzed: gang zhig dkar po'i sprul gyis ni //
translated: One who is seized by a white snake

original: lag pa g-yas pa bzung ba na //üîΩgang la yang dag bcu yi bar //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa bzung ba na // gang la yang dag bcu yi bar //
translated: with his right hand

original: de yis nor ni thob par nges //üîΩrgod ma khyim bya kra aunytsi //
analyzed: de yis nor ni thob par nges // rgod ma khyim bya kra aunytsi //
translated: will certainly obtain wealthüîΩwithin ten days.üîΩOne who, having seized a mare, a hen, or a crane,

original: thob nas gang gi gnyid sad na //
analyzed: thob nas gang gi gnyid sad na //
translated: awakens from sleep

original: de yis de dus snying sdug 'thob //üîΩchung ma nye du smra ba can //
analyzed: de yis de dus snying sdug 'thob // chung ma nye du smra ba can //
translated: will obtain a lover at that time.üîΩOne who is seized by a woman who speaks of her husband and relatives

original: gang gis bzung nas bcings pa dang // yang na lag pa zhags pas btab //
analyzed: gang gis bzung nas bcings pa dang // yang na lag pa zhags pas btab //
translated: and is bound with a noose around his hand

original: de las bu ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de las bu ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: will obtain a son from her

original: yang na gnas pa chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na gnas pa chen por 'gyur //
translated: or will become a great householder.

original: bram zer phyugs dang glang chen lha //
analyzed: bram zer phyugs dang glang chen lha //
translated: If a brahmin seizes cattle, an elephant, or a deity,

original: gzhan dag nag po shin tu ngan //
analyzed: gzhan dag nag po shin tu ngan //
translated: or another black one, it is very bad.

original: thod pa ras bal thal ba rus //
analyzed: thod pa ras bal thal ba rus //
translated: A skull, cotton, ashes, and bones,

original: gzhan rnams dkar po mngon par dga' //
analyzed: gzhan rnams dkar po mngon par dga' //
translated: and the others are white.üîΩIf one seizes a horse, a cow, a python,

original: rta bla mo dang lto 'phye dang // chu gnas srog chags bzung ba ni //
analyzed: rta bla mo dang lto 'phye dang // chu gnas srog chags bzung ba ni //
translated: or a water-dwelling creature,

original: rnam par rgyal ba'am dngos po 'thob //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'am dngos po 'thob //
translated: one will be victorious or obtain wealth.

original: yang na bu thob rnam par bshad //
analyzed: yang na bu thob rnam par bshad //
translated: Or else, it is explained that one will obtain a son.

original: gang zhig khrag gi btung ba 'thungs //
analyzed: gang zhig khrag gi btung ba 'thungs //
translated: If one drinks blood,

original: yang na chang ni rab tu 'thungs //
analyzed: yang na chang ni rab tu 'thungs //
translated: or else one drinks beer,

original: bram ze yin na rig pa thob //
analyzed: bram ze yin na rig pa thob //
translated: if one is a brahmin, one will obtain knowledge.

original: de las gzhan ni nor thob 'gyur //üîΩgal te rmi lam 'o ma'am //
analyzed: de las gzhan ni nor thob 'gyur // gal te rmi lam 'o ma'am //
translated: Otherwise, one will obtain wealth.üîΩIf in a dream one sees milk

original: ba yi 'o ma bzhos nas 'thungs //
analyzed: ba yi 'o ma bzhos nas 'thungs //
translated: or drinks sucked out cow‚Äôs milk,

original: de yis 'o ma'i btung ba thob //
analyzed: de yis 'o ma'i btung ba thob //
translated: one will obtain a drink of milk,

original: yang na sbyin sreg byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na sbyin sreg byed par 'gyur //
translated: or else one will perform a burnt offering.

original: zho mthong bas ni bde skyid 'byung //
analyzed: zho mthong bas ni bde skyid 'byung //
translated: Seeing curd, one will have happiness.

original: grong mthong nor dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: grong mthong nor dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: Seeing a town, one will become wealthy.

original: nas kyi sbyin sreg shes bar bya //
analyzed: nas kyi sbyin sreg shes bar bya //
translated: One should know the burnt offering of barley.

original: yungs kar gyis ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: yungs kar gyis ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: By mustard seeds, one will obtain.

original: me tog ldan na me tog shes //
analyzed: me tog ldan na me tog shes //
translated: If one has flowers, one will know flowers.

original: 'bras bu ldan na blo med blo //
analyzed: 'bras bu ldan na blo med blo //
translated: If one has fruit, one will have a mind without a mind.

original: me 'bar du ba can @135a * //
analyzed: me 'bar du ba can @135a * //
translated: If one sees a fire with smoke,

original: mthong na // me 'bar ba ni 'jigs par bshad //
analyzed: mthong na // me 'bar ba ni 'jigs par bshad //
translated: If one sees a blazing fire, it is explained as fear.üîΩSeats, beds, vehicles,

original: stan dang mal stan bzhon pa dang // lus po shing rta khyim rnams ni //
analyzed: stan dang mal stan bzhon pa dang // lus po shing rta khyim rnams ni //
translated: bodies, chariots, and housesüîΩwhen one is awakened from sleep

original: me 'bar 'dug tshe gnyid sad na //
analyzed: me 'bar 'dug tshe gnyid sad na //
translated: at the time of a blazing fire,

original: de yis de yi dpal rnams 'phel //
analyzed: de yis de yi dpal rnams 'phel //
translated: that increases one's glory.

original: rtags la mngon par mchod mthong na //
analyzed: rtags la mngon par mchod mthong na //
translated: If one sees the worship of the signs,

original: de yis bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: one's wishes will be fulfilled.

original: bye brag tu ni sku mthong na //
analyzed: bye brag tu ni sku mthong na //
translated: In particular, if one sees the body,

original: de yis lugs las rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis lugs las rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: one will be victorious over the system.

original: lha rnams bram ze can rnams dang // pha dang rtags can bud med rnams //
analyzed: lha rnams bram ze can rnams dang // pha dang rtags can bud med rnams //
translated: The gods, the brahmins, the father, the sign-bearers, and the women

original: rmi lam du ni mchog gang smras //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni mchog gang smras //
translated: speak the supreme in dreams.

original: de ni de ltar rnam par bshad //
analyzed: de ni de ltar rnam par bshad //
translated: That is explained in that way.üîΩFor whom the gods dance

original: gang la lha nyid gar byed dang // gzhogs stegs rgyug par byed pa rnams //
analyzed: gang la lha nyid gar byed dang // gzhogs stegs rgyug par byed pa rnams //
translated: and run along the sides,

original: de rnams yul bgrod rnam par bshad //
analyzed: de rnams yul bgrod rnam par bshad //
translated: those are explained as traveling to the country.

original: tsandan dmar po'i shing dag la //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po'i shing dag la //
translated: On a red sandalwood tree,

original: mar gyis byugs la sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: mar gyis byugs la sbyin sreg bya //
translated: anointed with ghee, one should make a burnt offering.

original: ga ya tri ni stong phrag bzlas //
analyzed: ga ya tri ni stong phrag bzlas //
translated: Recite Gayatri one thousand times.

original: de yis zhi ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis zhi ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: By that, one will attain peace.

original: 'di ni ngag dbang dgongs pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni ngag dbang dgongs pa ste //
translated: This is the opinion of Ngawang.

original: gang gis nang par klog pa de'i //
analyzed: gang gis nang par klog pa de'i //
translated: For one who recites this in the morning,

original: rmi lam ngan pa zlog par 'gyur //
analyzed: rmi lam ngan pa zlog par 'gyur //
translated: it will avert bad dreams.

original: rmi lam brtag pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rmi lam brtag pa rdzogs so /
translated: The examination of dreams is complete.

original: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta bi bh'u ti tsandras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta bi bh'u ti tsandras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: This was translated by the Indian pandit Vibhutichandra himself.
